typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> tcrossreference
tcrossreference filter(code_type_id == 113) ~> agreementtype
agreementtype aggregate(groupBy(target_code),
	target_description = first(target_description)) ~> deduplicator
deduplicator select(mapColumn(
		agt_description = target_code,
		agt_key = target_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameOutputColumn
renameOutputColumn derive(last_updated_by = 'pre_dim_agreement_type') ~> addLastUpdatedBy
addLastUpdatedBy alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		pk_key as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		agt_description as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_key = agt_key,
		last_updated_by,
		agt_description
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimAgreementType
